Translations.Text: Owange ggwe Nabbi gamba bakyalabo nti: bwe muba mwagala bulamu bw'ansi na birungi byaayo, kale mujje mbasibirire (mbawe e birungi bye mwagala) era mbate oluta olulungi
Naye bwe muba nga mwagala Katonda n'omubakawe, ne nyumba ey'enkomerero mazima Katonda yateekerateekera abakola obulungi mu mmwe, e mpeera e nsuffu

Abange mmwe abakyala ba Nabbi oyo yenna mu mmwe akola e kikolwa eky'obuwemu, wekikakasibwa nti yakikoze, e kibonerezo ekimuweebwa kibazibwamu emirundi ebiri (olw'okuba Mukyala wa Nabbi) era ekyo kyangu ku Katonda
N'oyo yenna mu mmwe (baka Nabbi) agondera Katonda n’omubakawe naakola emirimu emirungi tumuwa empeeraye emirundi ebiri, era twamutegekera riziki eweesa ekitiibwa

Abange baka Nabbi temufaanana bakyala balala, bwe muba mutidde Katonda kale temugonzanga enjogera olwo nno naakwatibwa amaddu oyo alina obulwadde mu mutima gwe, era (buli lwe mwogera) mwogere ebigambo eby'ensa

Era mukkalire mu mayumba gammwe era temwejaajaamyanga enneejaajaamya ey'obutamanya obwaliwo mu kusooka era muyimirizeewo e sswala ne Zakka mugitoole, era mugondere Katonda n’omubakawe mazima Katonda ayagala okubaggyako ebibi abange mmwe abantu bo mu nyumba (ya Nabbi) era abatukuze olutukuza olwa nnamaddala
Era mujjukirenga ebyo ebisomerwa mu mayumba gammwe mu bigambo bya Katonda n’ebigambo eby'amagezi (Hadith za Nabbi), mazima bulijjo Katonda akwata bulungi (abaddu) ate nga amanyi byonna ebibafaako
